span.span: Contains types that provide managed code access to the enhanced functionality of the Windows 7 taskbar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]任务栏提供增强的功能，使您能够使用任务栏按钮状态传达给用户和公开这样的常见任务的最小化的窗口或将其隐藏。The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality that enables you to use the taskbar button to communicate status to a user and expose common tasks when the window is minimized or hidden. 中的类型所公开的功能命名空间不可用之前的 Windows 版本中[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]。The functionality exposed by the types in the namespace is not available in versions of Windows prior to [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]. 在[!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)]，某些功能可能不可用，具体取决于用户的设置。In [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)], some functionality might not be available depending on the user's settings.
